item.title: 2006pk
item.dc:creator: @south-park south-park
item.description:
@south-park wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:6, topic:525856”][quote author=south-park link=topic=644598.msg4337011#msg4337011 date=1374534130]

Is that all there is? No extra stuff you added, but made it able to spawn?

That’s about it. It’s just a temporary server I put up while we work on 206Remade.
[/quote]
Because honestly the post looks completely weak.

There is no information on the spawn, where to train, where the popular pk spots are supposed to be. There is literally no information. Why would I bother with this, when I can go to a legitimate looking thread with details about the server.

You also said it’s a temporary server, so why would people even bother investing time into a server that was never intended to stay up in the first place?[/quote]

It’s just a server for people to have fun pking on while 2006Remade is in development. Everything is spawn-able, so why would it matter if it gets taken down?

Elrick:

where to train

Last time I remember, you don’t train on spawn/pk servers.

Read full topic

[/quote]

That’s about it. It’s just a temporary server I put up while we work on 206Remade.[/quote]
Because honestly the post looks completely weak.

There is no information on the spawn, where to train, where the popular pk spots are supposed to be. There is literally no information. Why would I bother with this, when I can go to a legitimate looking thread with details about the server.

You also said it’s a temporary server, so why would people even bother investing time into a server that was never intended to stay up in the first place?
